TextBlock.Text: CYCAD: Something or someone has disturbed the warp cores. When I emerged from the warp pad, I noticed some of the spare cores were missing. I have also spotted two naked singularities: one at the top of this cascade and one in the pool at the base.
OENO: Hypothesis: The cores were moved and the containment on two of them cracked in the process. I am unsure, however, of who would have reason to relocate them.
CYCAD: These will be difficult to handle safely. We should determine the location of their paired singularities before attempting to remove them.
OENO: The rest of the clan awaits us to see Poke, Pye, and Clary off on their expedition to the comet. We will have to resolve this situation another time.
